paragraphs.title: Get Live Ratings from Cassandra
paragraphs.text:
val cassandraConfig = Map("keyspace" -> "advancedspark", "table" -> "item_ratings")

val itemRatingsDF = sqlContext.read.format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(cassandraConfig)
  .load()
  .select($"userid", $"itemid", $"rating", $"timestamp")
  .withColumnRenamed("userid", "userId")
  .withColumnRenamed("itemid", "itemId")
  .as("itemRatings")
  
z.show(itemRatingsDF.sort($"userId" asc))

paragraphs.title: Split the dataset into training (80%) and test (20%) datasets
paragraphs.text: val Array(trainingItemRatingsDF, testItemRatingsDF) = itemRatingsDF.randomSplit(Array(0.8, 0.2))

result.msg:
trainingItemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: float, timestamp: bigint]
testItemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: float, timestamp: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Train The ALS Model With the training dataset
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS

val rank = 5 // this is k, number of latent factors we think exist
val maxIterations = 10
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val als = new ALS()
  .setRank(rank)
  .setRegParam(convergenceThreshold)
  .setUserCol("userId")
  .setItemCol("itemId")
  .setRatingCol("rating")
  .setImplicitPrefs(true)

val trainingModel = als.fit(trainingItemRatingsDF)

trainingModel.setPredictionCol("prediction")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS
rank: Int = 10
maxIterations: Int = 20
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
als: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS = als_1ec34f111dfb
trainingModel: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALSModel = als_1ec34f111dfb
res124: trainingModel.type = als_1ec34f111dfb

paragraphs.title: Evaluate the Model with the test dataset
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.RegressionEvaluator

val actualItemRatingsDF = trainingModel.transform(testItemRatingsDF)

val modelEvaluator = new RegressionEvaluator()
  .setMetricName("rmse")
  .setLabelCol("rating")
  .setPredictionCol("prediction")

val rmse = modelEvaluator.evaluate(actualItemRatingsDF)

println(s"Root Mean Square Error = $rmse between actual and expected itemRatings")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.RegressionEvaluator
actualItemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: float, timestamp: bigint, prediction: float]
modelEvaluator: org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.RegressionEvaluator = regEval_52ce5ef2aabc
rmse: Double = NaN
Root Mean Square Error = NaN between actual and expected itemRatings

paragraphs.title: Retrain with the entire dataset
paragraphs.text:
val model = als.fit(itemRatingsDF)

model.setPredictionCol("prediction")

paragraphs.title: Find all (User, item) pairs without an existing Rating
paragraphs.text:
val allDistinctUsersDF = itemRatingsDF.select($"userId")
  .distinct()
  .as("users")

val allDistinctItemsDF = itemRatingsDF.select($"itemId")
  .distinct()
  .as("items")

val allUserItemPairsDF = allDistinctUsersDF.join(allDistinctItemsDF)
  .except(itemRatingsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId"))
  .cache()

z.show(allUserItemPairsDF.sort($"userId", $"itemId"))

paragraphs.title: Generate Recommendations for (user, Item) Pairs
Enrich the Recommendations
paragraphs.text:
val enrichedRecommendationsDF = 
   recommendationsDF.join(itemsDF, $"items.itemId" === $"recommendations.itemId")
   .select($"userId", $"items.itemId", $"title", $"description", $"tags", $"img", $"prediction")
   .sort($"userId", $"prediction" desc, $"items.itemId")
   
z.show(enrichedRecommendationsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId", $"title", $"prediction"))

paragraphs.title: Store Recommendations in ElasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")

enrichedRecommendationsDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
  .mode("overwrite")
  .options(esConfig)
  .save("advancedspark/personalized-als")

z.show(enrichedRecommendationsDF)

paragraphs.title: Show UserFactors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

val userFactorsDF = model.userFactors.map(row => 
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("userId", "userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .as("userFactors")

z.show(userFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Show ItemFactors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
 
val itemFactorsDF = model.itemFactors.map(row =>
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("itemId", "itemFactors")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .as("itemFactors")

z.show(itemFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Enriched ItemFactors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
val enrichedItemFactorsDF = itemFactorsDF
  .join(itemsDF, $"items.itemId" === $"itemFactors.itemId")
  .select($"items.itemId", $"title", $"tags", $"itemFactors", $"img")
  .sort($"items.itemId")
  .as("enrichedItemFactors")

z.show(enrichedItemFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Calculate Predicted Rating for a Given userId and ItemId - compare Prediction to above
paragraphs.text:
import com.advancedspark.ml.BLAS
import com.advancedspark.ml.Vectors

// User 21619
val givenUserId = 21619
val givenUserFactors = userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
  .where($"userId" === givenUserId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Double](1).toArray)
  .collect()(0)

// Item 10006 - Tom Cruise
val givenItemId = 10006
val givenItemFactors = itemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"itemFactors")
  .where($"itemId" === givenItemId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Double](1).toArray)
  .collect()(0)
  
val givenUserFactorsVector = Vectors.dense(givenUserFactors)
val givenItemFactorsVector = Vectors.dense(givenItemFactors)

// Take dot product of the User x Item vectors
// This should equal the prediction value in the offline-generated matrix
val prediction = BLAS.dot(givenUserFactorsVector, givenItemFactorsVector)

paragraphs.title: Write the User and item factor vectors to elasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")

userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/user-factors-als")
 
enrichedItemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"title", $"itemFactors", $"tags", $"img")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/item-factors-als")

paragraphs.title: Save UserFactors In Json Format
paragraphs.text:
userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .coalesce(1)
 .write.format("json")
 .partitionBy("userId")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .save("/root/pipeline/datasets/serving/live-recommendations/json/als")

result.msg: warning: there were 1 feature warning(s); re-run with -feature for details

paragraphs.title: Save ItemFactors in json Format
paragraphs.text:
enrichedItemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"itemFactors")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .coalesce(1)
 .write.format("json")
 .partitionBy("itemId")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .save("/root/pipeline/datasets/serving/live-recommendations/json/als")
